resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: Creating a DataFrame using Pandas (0.25.1 + pyarrow 0.14.1) which includes NaN value as a last entry in the column results in wrong ResultBatch num_rows()

comments.body: [~alippai] could you create a PR against parquet-testing to add the NaN file please
